languages.text: {n}Арбитр даже не улыбается в ответ. Его лицо коверкают вспышки яростных эмоций, которые он пытается взять под контроль.{/n}
{n}He does not return your smile. His face is contorted by flashes of furious emotion that he is struggling to control.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр даже не улыбается в ответ. Его лицо коверкают вспышки яростных эмоций, которые он пытается взять под контроль.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il grimace au lieu de vous rendre votre sourire, assailli par des émotions furieuses qu'il a du mal à contrôler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He does not return your smile. His face is contorted by flashes of furious emotion that he is struggling to control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il grimace au lieu de vous rendre votre sourire, assailli par des émotions furieuses qu'il a du mal à contrôler.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼はあなたの微笑みに応えなかった。彼の顔は、激しい感情がほとばしるのを必死に抑えようとして歪んでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He does not return your smile. His face is contorted by flashes of furious emotion that he is struggling to control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はあなたの微笑みに応えなかった。彼の顔は、激しい感情がほとばしるのを必死に抑えようとして歪んでいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}No te devuelve la sonrisa. Las emociones que se esfuerza por controlar atraviesan fugazmente su cara una y otra vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He does not return your smile. His face is contorted by flashes of furious emotion that he is struggling to control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No te devuelve la sonrisa. Las emociones que se esfuerza por controlar atraviesan fugazmente su cara una y otra vez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他并没有同样报以笑容，脸上反而露出了一闪而过的怒火——他在努力克制着怒意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He does not return your smile. His face is contorted by flashes of furious emotion that he is struggling to control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他并没有同样报以笑容，脸上反而露出了一闪而过的怒火——他在努力克制着怒意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gülümsemene karşılık vermiyor. Kontrol etmekte zorlandığı hiddetini düşündükçe yüzü kasılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He does not return your smile. His face is contorted by flashes of furious emotion that he is struggling to control.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}O, gülümsemene karşılık vermiyor. Kontrol etmekte zorlandığı hiddetini düşündükçe yüzü kasılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Er erwidert dein Lächeln nicht. Auf seinem Gesicht zeichnen sich wilde Emotionen ab, die er zu kontrollieren versucht.{/n}
